title: Episode 305: Babe, Can I Use Your Car? (Mr. and Mrs. Icewear Vezzo)
itunes:title: Episode 305: Babe, Can I Use Your Car? (Mr. and Mrs. Icewear Vezzo)
description:
Icewear Vezzo and his wife Kiara join the ladies of Lip Service this week to promote his latest mixtape "Rich Off Pints." The beautiful couple opens up about all the ups and downs of their relationship, how Icewear Vezzo going to jail saved their relationship, and much more. Vezzo tries to convince Kiara to have a threesome, but she's clearly not having it. Also, Icewear Vezzo admits to the time he took Kiara's car to attempt a robbery.....enjoy! If you're in Detroit, make sure to check out Kiara's juice bar, opening soon!

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
